typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		enquiry_date as string,
		created_on as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['test/staging_data/*.txt']) ~> StagingDataSource
StagingDataSource derive(each(match(name=='enquiry_date'), 'year' = year(toDate(substring(enquiry_date,0,10),'yyyy-MM-dd')), 'month' = month(toDate(substring(enquiry_date,0,10),'yyyy-MM-dd')))) ~> PartitionDerivedColumn
StagingDataSource aggregate(created_on = max(created_on)) ~> MaxOfLastModifiedDateAggregate
StagingDataSource derive(each(match(position==1), 'year' = year(currentDate()), 'month' = month(currentDate()))) ~> DerivedColumn1
PartitionDerivedColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		year,
		month
	)) ~> ProductionDataSink
MaxOfLastModifiedDateAggregate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MetaDataSink
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		year,
		month
	)) ~> stagingaarchivedatasink
